text: Mark Gunn is a screenwriter and producer based in Pasadena, California who wrote the screenplays for the films Journey 2: The Mysterious Island and Brightburn. ==Life and career== Mark Gunn was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He is the cousin of screenwriter James Gunn, actor and political writer Matt Gunn, former Senior Vice President of Artisan Entertainment Patrick Gunn,Patrick Gunn profile, qualiacapital.com; accessed December 4, 2014. actor Sean Gunn, and writer Brian Gunn. His father, Michael Gunn, is a past President of the Missouri Bar Association. Gunn is known for Journey 2: The Mysterious Island (2012), Bring It On Again (2004)Bring It On Again DVD Talk and 2gether (2000).2Ge+her Bio on MTV He was elected to the Writers Guild of America West Board of Directors in 2006.
